soft_skills_courses.title: Effective Communication
soft_skills_courses.description: Learn how to communicate effectively in both personal and professional settings.
soft_skills_courses.other_info: This course covers verbal and non-verbal communication techniques, active listening, and conflict resolution strategies. Duration: 6 weeks. Instructor-led sessions with interactive exercises.

soft_skills_courses.title: Teamwork and Collaboration
soft_skills_courses.description: Enhance your ability to work collaboratively with others and achieve common goals.
soft_skills_courses.other_info: Explore team dynamics, effective delegation, and problem-solving in group settings. Duration: 8 weeks. Includes group projects and peer feedback. Self-paced learning.

soft_skills_courses.title: Leadership Development
soft_skills_courses.description: Develop essential leadership skills to motivate and gu_ide teams towards success.
soft_skills_courses.other_info: Learn leadership theories, decision-making strategies, and techniques for inspiring and empowering others. Duration: 10 weeks. Engaging lectures and case studies. Instructor-led.

soft_skills_courses.title: Conflict Resolution
soft_skills_courses.description: Learn strategies to resolve conflicts peacefully and maintain positive relationships.
soft_skills_courses.other_info: Understand different conflict resolution styles, negotiation tactics, and mediation techniques. Duration: 6 weeks. Role-playing scenarios and real-world case studies. Self-paced learning.

soft_skills_courses.title: Time Management
soft_skills_courses.description: Master the art of time management to boost productivity and reduce stress.
soft_skills_courses.other_info: Discover time management tools, prioritization techniques, and strategies for minimizing distractions. Duration: 8 weeks. Practical exercises and personalized time management plans. Instructor-led sessions.
